'''Xakoras''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Another Saint buried at the [Engwithan waystation](/engwithanWaystation/), Xakoras was immortalized as one who bore the crown of devotion.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =x
}}

## Trivia

* Xakoras is a named [Engwithan saint](/engwithanSaint/), albeit with slightly different stats (56 vs. 52 Deflection, 70 vs. 37 Fortitude, 68 vs. 59 Reflex, 82 vs. 83 Will.) When approached, he attacks, spawning a multitude of creatures to defend himself.

[Category:Engwithan waystation characters](/categoryEngwithanWaystationCharacters/)
